lead_paragraph: Wang Zhenmin, of the law department at Beijing’s Central Liaison Office in Hong Kong, said British colonial legislation was still in force and could be used against activists.

headline.main: China’s Top Lawyer in Hong Kong Says Secession Advocates Could Face Prosecution

snippet: Wang Zhenmin, of the law department at Beijing’s Central Liaison Office in Hong Kong, said British colonial legislation was still in force and could be used against activists.
